name: LeapPong
description:
IMPORTANT: This game uses ES6 Features that are only natively supported by Google Chrome right now. It will work on Edge with Experimental Javascript turned on.

This is LeapPong, a game I made for 3DJam at the very last minute almost. My leap motion took a long time to get to me so this is all I had time to make. I hope you enjoy this kick back to the past now with 3D Motion Control (flattened to 2d...)
